Name: May Cheung
Short Bio: Hi! I'm May and I manage the programs and events for the immersive programs (Web & iOS). Before Flatiron, I worked at a nonprofit (iMentor) for 5 years. Fun fact: I play in a shuffleboard league!

Name: Cricky Cicchetti
Short Bio: Haaaay. I'm the Events Manager at Flatiron School. I have a fluffy cat named Professor Puff. So excited to meet you all!

Name: Ian Candy
Short Bio: Hi everyone! I'm Ian and I'll be the lead instructor for the course. Since graduationg from Flatiron School, I've been an instructor with the precollege team, a developer with the labs team working on the Learn platform, and an instructor in the adult immersive. Prior to Flatiron, I managed technology for a progressive elementary school in Manhattan where I taught Intro to Coding to 3rd graders using Scratch. I grew up outside of Pittsburgh and have been living in New York for about 8 years.  In my free time, I enjoy riding my bike around the park, camping, rooting for the Steelers, and speaking Pittsburghese.

Name: JJ Seymour
Short Bio: Hi all! I'm JJ and I will be the junior instructor for your class. I graduated recently from Flatiron School and am really excited to teach and help you all through this course. I'm a big fan of games (board and video), music and sports. Please feel free to reach out with any concerns, issues or if you just want to say 'Hey'!

Name: Khaleda Khan
Short Bio: Hi there!  My name is Khaleda.  For the last eight years I have been a Behavioral Ornithologist (I research bird behavior), but now I am very exicted to pursue a new career in web development with all of you!

Name: Dillon McRoberts
Short Bio: Hey there, I'm Dillon. For the past five years I've worked for an environmental law firm. Before getting into that I studied nonfiction literature and journalism. Looking forward to meeting you all and learning!

Name: Andrew J. Klein
Short Bio: I love the Mets! I've worked for the past two years in the construction and architectural engineering industry. Before that I went to Stanford and CMU for civil engineering degrees

Name: Charlie Cook
Short Bio: Hi I'm Charlie - I've worked in advertising for the past 6 years as a strategist. Studied economics at school. I'm a big soccer fan.

Name: Ece Ozalp
Short Bio: Hi! My name is pronounced like Edge-Ay or AJ, I studied Literature and Political Science at Duke and received an MFA in Creative Writing from the New School. Very excited to be here

Name: Gentian Bardhoshi
Short Bio: Hello! I'm Gentian. I'm a recent grad from Penn who majored in Philosophy, Politics, & Econ. Love exploring the city and trying new things!

Name: Jasper Curry
Short Bio: Hi all - I'm Jasper. I studied economics international business at University of Florida. My hobbies include sailing and cycling. I'm looking forward to moving to NYC and meeting everyone.

Name: Abigail Diaz
Short Bio: Hi All, my name is Abigail. My background has been primarily in technology, having spent some time working in tech consulting. I also love art and creative studies. I'm looking forward to learning something new and meeting new people!

Name: Colby Schulz
Short Bio: Hi, I'm Colby. I studied civil engineering at the Univerisity of Illinois, and have spent the past 5 years working at a transportation infrastructure consulting firm. I'm an avid runner, and plan on checking out as much live music as possible in New York. Exicted to get started!

Name: Tami Jaton
Short Bio: I love music and cats! I studied music in college, got a master's in songwriting, and have spent my career doing a hodgepodge of SEO copywriting, music teaching, performing, recording, and other pursuits. I play violin and ukulele!

Name: Ali Mullin
Short Bio: Hi, I'm Ali! I studied Neuroscience at Brown University and have been teaching high school math in Miami for the past two years. I love the outdoors, soccer, and people!

Name: Tony Mai
Short Bio: Hi all, I'm Tony. I was an English Major and focused on Secondary Education at Stony Brook University. I've been a teacher and instructional coach/staff supporter for the past 8 years. I love all team sports! I'm excited to meet you all and get started on these coding adventures!

Name: Schyler Hosler
Short Bio: Hellurrr… I’m Schyler (pronounced "SKY-LER”). Background in Customer Service. I’m a bit indoorsie, but I’m willing to step away from video games and horror films for some good mood food! Places you might find me: Home, The BK Lounge, anywhere w/ A/C, etc. Excited to get started on 7/25!

Name: Daniella Penn
Short Bio: Hey, I'm Daniella. I graduated a year ago as an English major and spent the past year working in communications at my alma mater. Love to hike, dance

Name: Alexandria Sanborn
Short Bio: Hi, I'm Alex. I just finished my MA in Literature at Purdue and I taught a writing course there as well. I enjoy reading, travel, and cross stitching. Looking forward to meeting all of you!

Name: Troy Chryssos
Short Bio: Howdy! I'm Troy. I studied music production and songwriting at NYU and have spent the past year freelancing as an audio engineer and playin' around Brooklyn with my band.

Name: Francis Rocco
Short Bio: Hey! I'm Francis. I graduated with a BS in chemical engineering from Northeastern U (Boston, not Chicago) in 2013 and have been on the pursuit of happiness since then. I love NYC, running, and Beyoncé.

Name: Clifton (Cliff) Regis
Short Bio: Hi there! I am excited about starting this journey with you all. I have a background in Human Resources (16 years exp). I love cooking, golf, learning new things and traveling. So far I traveled to over 25 countries.  See you soon!

Name: Alice Kallaugher
Short Bio: Hi all! I'm Alice. I'm originally from England, but have lived in Baltimore for about 3 years. Most recently I worked for a blindness advocacy nonprofit, and am really into accessibility technology. I love reading, crafting, and taking many naps.

Name: Mahati Gollamudi
Short Bio: Hello! My name is Mahati. I am an art historian and have spent the past two years working for the Smithsonain. I love working out and going on walks to audiobooks and have a problematic addition to the BBC.

Name: Mary Boyd
Short Bio: Hello! I'm Mary. I studied English/writing in college and have been working as an editor/marketing writer for the past eight years, and wanted to make a switch into tech/do something new. I'm a crazy cat lady, I love to read and travel, and I play the violin. Looking forward to meeting everyone!

Name: Logan Gants
Short Bio: Hey, I recently graduated with an MBA from UNC, but I've always wanted to learn programming and I thought this would be a great opportunity to pursue that interest.
